name: Network Like a Hyperscaler
meta_description: Transform your approach to network operations with Hedgehog's Kubernetes-native fabric platform. This comprehensive pathway teaches you to provision, monitor, a
summary_markdown:
Transform your approach to network operations with Hedgehog's Kubernetes-native fabric platform. This comprehensive pathway teaches you to provision, monitor, and troubleshoot modern datacenter networks using the same declarative infrastructure-as-code principles that power the world's largest hyperscalers.

Whether you're a cloud-native engineer learning networking or a traditional network engineer adopting Kubernetes, this pathway bridges both worlds—building confidence through hands-on labs, systematic workflows, and real-world operational scenarios. By the end, you'll operate Hedgehog fabrics with the same confidence you have managing Kubernetes workloads.

summary_markdown: Learn how to author modules, assemble courses, and structure pathways. This pathway introduces core authoring skills and shows how individual pieces roll up into complete learning experiences.

name: Hedgehog Learn: Course Authoring Pathway
meta_description:

Journey Overview:

summary_markdown:
Become a Hedgehog Learn content authoring expert through this comprehensive pathway.

Journey Overview:

  • Master module creation with markdown and front matter
  • Learn media, metadata, and SEO optimization
  • Assemble modules into structured courses
  • Create comprehensive learning pathways with content blocks
  • Implement quality assurance and troubleshooting practices

This pathway takes you from beginner to expert content creator, ready to build complete learning experiences.

name: Getting Started (Courses Demo)
meta_description: This is a demo pathway that references the Getting Started course instead of individual modules. This demonstrates the new Courses feature and how pathways can
summary_markdown:
This is a demo pathway that references the Getting Started course instead of individual modules. This demonstrates the new Courses feature and how pathways can now prefer courses over direct module references.

This pathway is for testing and demonstration purposes, showing how course_slugs_json is populated when a pathway references courses.

name: Getting Started with Hedgehog Lab
meta_description: Start here to get hands‑on in the Hedgehog Virtual Lab. Follow this guided pathway to access the lab in your preferred cloud and complete your introductory exer
summary_markdown: Start here to get hands‑on in the Hedgehog Virtual Lab. Follow this guided pathway to access the lab in your preferred cloud and complete your introductory exercises.

name: Getting Started
meta_description: Start your Hedgehog journey by setting up your virtual lab environment. This pathway guides you through creating a cloud-based virtual machine configured to run
summary_markdown:
Start your Hedgehog journey by setting up your virtual lab environment. This pathway guides you through creating a cloud-based virtual machine configured to run the Hedgehog Virtual Lab, regardless of which cloud provider you prefer.

You'll learn how to provision the right VM size, enable nested virtualization, and connect to your environment—all the essential prerequisites before installing and exploring Hedgehog Fabric in the VLAB.

name: Lab Onboarding
meta_description: Access your Hedgehog VLAB and learn core environment setup. This pathway guides you from first login through essential configuration so you’re ready to start le
summary_markdown: Access your Hedgehog VLAB and learn core environment setup. This pathway guides you from first login through essential configuration so you’re ready to start learning.
